mapper.select: select u.id, u.user_name, m.member_profile_url, p.id, p.post_content, p.post_status, p.created_datetime, p.updated_datetime, ujc.job_category from tbl_user u join tbl_member m on u.id = m.user_id join tbl_post p on m.user_id = p.member_id join tbl_user_job_category ujc on u.id = ujc.user_id where p.post_status = 'active'
